page.title: 15TODAY'S LIFE-STYLES.
page.content: Many women work away from home; commuters spend long hours away. Cultural pursuits and education tend to be out side the area and with smaller families the viability of some youth clubs is reduced. Toddlers increasingly attend play groups.TV has a marked influence on social life. Residents often move on after some years and few are born and brought up here. All households possess labour- saving appliances and some have videos. Children own bicycles. A car is needed for shoppong except in Ripley, hence many two-car families. In the affluent parts of the area many people own holiday homes or caravans and take an annual holiday abroad. The less affluent find the lack of public transport constricting.Recently there has been a marked increase in the level of spending on leisure pursuits.
